column5: Why are all these TV guys kissing their fish all the time? Yuck..
The only reason they fish so much is because they have no wives.  I'd be kissing fish too if I were that lonely.
if it was the worls record large mouth i would kiss it lol  cheers!
In Newfoundland,  it's customary or tradition for a visitor to kiss a cod and shoot screech.  Good times.
